title: 1. The Daylight War: Book Three of The Demon Cycle
FR - The Daylight War: Book Three of The Demon Cycle
ES - The Daylight War: Book Three of The Demon Cycle
description: Continuing the impressive debut fantasy series from author Peter V. Brett, The DAYLIGHT WAR is book three of the Demon Cycle, pulling the reader into a world of demons, darkness and heroes.
